description: The only hybrid insulation jacket with down in Mammut's collection, the Flexidown IN Jacket Men features a combination of light and soft Pertex® Quantum material and pleasantly soft Pontetorto® Tecnostretch for freedom of movement and aesthetic appeal. As a recycling product, the jacket’s down filling is good for the wearer out in the cold and good for the environment at the same time.
name: Flexidown IN Jacket - Mens
